arts.ttl: Four Things We Learnt from Tottenham‚Äôs 1-0 Victory over Villarreal
arts.sum: Operating from the right, the former West Ham man stretched Villarreal from the opening minutes, linking well with Pedro Porro and repeatedly getting behind the visitors‚Äô back line. Tottenham‚Äôs early breakthrough came from that flank: a low cross forced an error from Villarreal goalkeeper Luiz Junior, who bundled the ball into his own net inside four minutes.

arts.sum: Thomas Frank 's first Champions League game was far from a blockbuster, but Spurs eventually ran out 1-0 winners after a hard-fought clash.

arts.ttl: Mark Clattenburg says referee got it completely ‚Äòwrong‚Äô on Xavi Simons incident in Spurs win vs Villarreal
Luiz J√∫nior howler hands Spurs win over Villarreal in nervy elite debut for Frank
arts.athr: David Hytner at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium
arts.sum: But can he do it in the Champions League? It was one of the grumbles from the Tottenham fanbase when their club appointed Thomas Frank given how his experience of European football extended to little more than a handful of Europa League qualifiers with Brondby more than a decade ago. It was a nervy debut for Frank in the big time, his team retreating into their shells after half-time, looking to hold on to the lead they were presented with at the outset by one of the great goalkeeping howlers. It was a moment to haunt Luiz J√∫nior. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Tottenham 1-0 Villarreal: Spurs begin Champions League campaign with a hard-fought win courtesy of early own goal gaffe from goalkeeper Luiz Junior
arts.sum: MATT BARLOW AT THE TOTTENHAM HOTSPUR STADIUM: Victory in Europe, again. Not quite amid jubilant scenes akin to Bilbao in May but the same outcome, a not convincing 1-0 Spurs win.

arts.sum: The 32-year-old's trip to London comes mere hours before he is expected at Southwark Crown Court on Wednesday morning to answer charges of rape.
